page.title: 13Cairnbulg, near Fraserburgh.
page.content: Proposals are going ahead for a BMX course, skatebowl, cafe, swings, plus houses for the elderly. The houses will be made on an old football pitch. The beacon at Cairnbulg is very old. The light was fitted in l9l3. There is a strong current beside it. It is called the Trath. The beacon was built in the l9th century. There used to be a river separating Cairnbulg and Inverallochy but now it is a road called Rathen Road. There is a monkey pole that people used to climb to watch for enemy ships or boats. One night the keeper went out to the beacon to light the light. When he came down he was trapped because the Trath had gone over the rocks. He had to stay there all night until the tide went out.
